Stage 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison}, flat-footed, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 4 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

xGPdcgIZR0tAI9IY.name: Hair Barrage
xGPdcgIZR0tAI9IY.description: The tarantula flicks its legs, flinging spiky hairs in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. This deals [[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6 piercing damage} with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true] save.

Giant Viper.name: 巨蝰 Giant Viper
Giant Viper.publicNotes:
The giant viper's fangs are a frightening sight, with injection tubes as long as daggers. The sheer amount of venom injected by a giant viper can cause severe blood clotting and leave a victim utterly drained of vitality.

Snakes come in an array of forms, from jungle-dwelling constrictors that wrap around their prey to venomous vipers with deadly bites. Regardless, all snakes consume their prey whole by unhinging their jaws and using powerful muscles to move the food down their throats and into their stomachs.

MEjtnkYdPhtWGyzF.name: Coiled Opportunity
MEjtnkYdPhtWGyzF.description:
The snake can use this reaction only if it's Coiled.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

1fzwu2J1jldVzBPc.name: Coil
1fzwu2J1jldVzBPc.description: The giant viper uses an action to coil itself, increasing its reach with its fangs from 5 to 10 feet. After the giant viper Strikes with its fangs, it becomes uncoiled.

lqMgsu5wZAOsEwK2.name: Giant Viper Venom
lqMgsu5wZAOsEwK2.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}

Gourd Leshy.name: 葫芦莱西 Gourd Leshy
Gourd Leshy.publicNotes:
Gourd leshys are guardians of fields, gardens, and farms. Many villages benefit from the protection of a gourd leshy, even if they are unaware of it.

Leshys are intelligent plant creatures that guard areas of primeval wilderness or earthly power. Originally created by powerful fey, they manifest when a skilled practitioner of primal magic-typically a druid-combines a nature spirit with a body carefully grown from local vegetation. The rites and materials required to create a leshy vary depending on the type of leshy. They are typically given life in an area of great natural significance, such as an arboreal's grove, a druidic circle, a fairy ring, or a great natural wonder.

NfSCCIAzcvdGsuLs.name: Keepsake
NfSCCIAzcvdGsuLs.description: The leshy can store an item of light Bulk or less in its head, concealing it as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection}. If stored for 24 hours, the item benefits from @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dINQzhqGmIsqGMUY]{Mending}.

Eizm8JTXmxGFPtFL.name: Verdant Burst
Eizm8JTXmxGFPtFL.description: When a gourd leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from its body, restoring [[/r {1d8}[healing]]]{1d8 Hit Points} to each plant creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. This area is filled with gourds, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for these gourds, they wither after 24 hours.

sCLiSoe59ubmpiPk.name: Change Shape
sCLiSoe59ubmpiPk.description:
The gourd leshy transforms into a Small gourd-bearing plant. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{Tree Shape}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

20xbqCZ1qrIT5Yqx.name: Ensnare
20xbqCZ1qrIT5Yqx.description:
When the gourd leshy damages a creature with a fist or seed Strike, vines lash out from the leshy (or seed) and wrap around the target's limbs. The target must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:17] save. On a failure, the target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 round; on a critical failure, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round and the penalty to Speed lasts for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.fPhbDSTPuT01f0Kn]{Effect: Ensnare}

Griffon.name: 狮鹫 Griffon
Griffon.publicNotes:
Griffons are regal beasts revered as symbols of freedom and strength in many cultures. They are physically striking, with the hindquarters of a lion and the head, wings, and forelimbs of a great bird of prey-typically an eagle, but some instead bear the features of a hawk, falcon, or even osprey or vulture. In rare cases, the griffon's hindquarters may resemble those of a different great cat, such as a leopard or tiger. The variations seem to conform to the environment in which the griffon lives-for instance, the especially rare griffons of northern Avistan have the hindquarters of a Grungir lynx and the upper body of a snowy owl-though this is not always the case. Some griffons lack wings altogether. These wingless griffons, known as alces, result from a rare mutation. Among a clutch of other griffons, the alce is typically considered the runt, so few of these offshoots survive their fledgling stage. Those alces that do make it to adulthood tend to be tougher, more violent, and more aloof than most griffons.

Wild griffons rely on their powerful wings to hold them aloft and their keen eyesight to spy out prey. The speed with which they plunge toward the ground and grab up their victims is shocking. They may tear open victim's flesh with their razor-sharp beaks, but usually just take their prey to a high, secluded location where they can enjoy their feast without interruptions. On the ground, they take cover and leap out to ambush prey, then fly off with their prize. The exception to this is when a griffon is hunting to feed its offspring, in which case it will almost never purposefully bring a living creature back to its nest for fear of endangering its chicks.

Skilled animal trainers long ago learned how to raise griffons as mounts for military forces or powerful individuals. Such mounts are known for their strength, bravery, and unfailing loyalty. They are among the smartest of animals and possess a wisdom not normally afforded most animals; it is thought that a griffon chooses its rider as much as a rider chooses the griffon. The process of training a griffon to accept and carry a rider in flight is a long and expensive ordeal. Griffon trainers charge rich sums for their services, and a ruler who can boast of owning a stable of griffons is the subject of great respect and envy.

GCyLSeOtTMt3wLur.name: Flying Strafe
GCyLSeOtTMt3wLur.description: The griffon Flies up to its fly Speed and makes two talon Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature. The attacks take the normal multiple attack penalty.

OAt8guQQNXMQRYHW.name: Pounce
OAt8guQQNXMQRYHW.description: The griffon Strides and makes a talon Strike at the end of that movement. If the griffon began this action @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, it remains hidden until after the attack.

Graveknight.name: 死墓骑士 Graveknight
Graveknight.publicNotes: Graveknights are undead warriors granted unlife by a cursed suit of armor.

vYamsmUJUWGVxqsL.name: +1 Resilient Full Plate
vYamsmUJUWGVxqsL.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor and a pair of gauntlets.

0Pe1uBGVehRLhBim.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

oKuYToU9Nv9ALIIv.name: Rejuvenation
oKuYToU9Nv9ALIIv.description:
When a graveknight is destroyed, its armor rebuilds its body over the course of [[/br 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}-or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts.

A graveknight can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating its armor (such as with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}), transporting it to the Positive Energy Plane, or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

xH6NrBw4bYEHU7e3.name: Sacrilegious Aura
xH6NrBw4bYEHU7e3.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature in the aura uses a positive spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+17 #Counteract]]{+17}.

1UmNfowZ4HWxS9rx.name: Devastating Blast
1UmNfowZ4HWxS9rx.description:
The graveknight unleashes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy. Creatures in the area take [[/r {6d12}[cold]]]{6d12 cold damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true] save).

The graveknight can use this ability once every [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Devastating Blast]]{1d4 rounds}.

snOrUVs5f8v8gtuP.name: Graveknight's Curse
snOrUVs5f8v8gtuP.description:
This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:will|dc:33] save

Onset 1 hour

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, the creature's Speed is reduced by 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day)

Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.6rnB7nK6J6zF4vea]{Effect: Graveknight's Curse}

cYzNZC3Tju4useHD.name: Phantom Mount
cYzNZC3Tju4useHD.description:
HP 58; AC 27, Fort +17, Ref +15, Will +14

The graveknight summons a supernatural mount as per @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WPKJOhEihhcIm2uQ]{Phantom Steed}, heightened to a level equal to half the graveknight's level.

Unlike phantom steed, the steed's AC and saving throw bonuses are all 4 lower than the graveknight's, and the steed has one-third the graveknight's Hit Points (rounded down).

If the steed is destroyed, the graveknight must wait 1 hour before using this ability again.

t6KHJCiZXdNJnqxB.name: Weapon Master
t6KHJCiZXdNJnqxB.description: The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.

Guthallath.name: 巨神兵 Guthallath
Guthallath.publicNotes:
A guthallath is an enormous construct created long ago by some unknown empire, probably as a war machine. Nearly 100 feet tall, this massive stone statue typically resembles a stalwart warrior wearing only a loincloth and skullcap. Few have seen the entire body of a guthallath, though; most of the time such a relic is buried up to its neck, covered in moss and stranded in some forgotten place. Yet, every so often, one of these harbingers of destruction reactivates in response to some unknown stimulus or rallying call, and when this happens, woe be unto any who stand in its way.

While the guthallath's ancient enemies are gone, it is an engine of pure destruction, designed to rampage for weeks or even months. While not intelligent enough to enjoy or regret its acts, the guthallath cannot be reasoned with-it is unaffected by most magic, and is unpredictable in how it selects its targets (and creatures it spares).

WxXnLt5HTzEPK07R.name: True Seeing (Constant)
WxXnLt5HTzEPK07R.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

zHxfOvUJuKUsqaR4.name: Haste (Constant)
zHxfOvUJuKUsqaR4.description:
魔法强化了目标，令其行动迅速。它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，并且每轮可以使用该额外动作以打击或者行走。

升阶 (7环级) 你能以至多6个生物为目标。

5Yp3kZDHE8gZhhLe.name: 拳头 Fist
5Yp3kZDHE8gZhhLe.description: The Guthallath can choose either @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.i18TlebMzwONyPhI]{Improved Grab} or @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.6l7e7CHQLESlI57U]{Improved Push 20 feet} when it hits with a fist attack.

VVvneLCIn09BPxX7.name: Erosion Aura
VVvneLCIn09BPxX7.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:120]{120 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

The guthallath erodes away the physical integrity of all around it. Creatures and objects in the emanation other than the guthallath have their hardness and resistances reduced by 10. At the start of its turn, a creature in the erosion aura's area takes [[/r {6d6}[bludgeoning]]]{6d6 bludgeoning damage} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:39|basic:true]).

nCvEdtYwtDcpBscl.name: Immunity to Magic
nCvEdtYwtDcpBscl.description: The guthallath is immune to spells of lower than 7th level and the activated effects of magic items of lower than 14th level.

D0q0aNWo1X51cNe4.name: Annihilation Beams
D0q0aNWo1X51cNe4.description:
A guthallath releases two beams of destruction from its eyes. Each beam is a @Template[type:line|distance:120]. Everything in either line takes the effect of a hit from a 10th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} spell (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|basic:true|traits:attack,evocation,arcane]). There is no additional effect on creatures in any area where the beams overlap.

The guthallath can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Annihilation Beams]]{1d4 rounds}.

tDvcon2bK9xEGh90.name: Deadly Throw
tDvcon2bK9xEGh90.description:
Requirements The guthallath has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

Effect The guthallath throws the creature into the air, 100 feet high and 50 feet away. If the flung creature lands on another creature, the creature it lands on takes the same amount of bludgeoning damage. The creature being landed on can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save.

v8RLawIxRUNc3rnR.name: Powerful Blows
v8RLawIxRUNc3rnR.description: If a guthallath hits with an attack and rolls a natural 19 on the d20 roll, the attack is a critical hit. This has no effect if the 19 would be a failure.

Hill Giant.name: 山丘巨人 Hill Giant
Hill Giant.publicNotes:
Selfish and crude, these rough-skinned raiders are bullies and ultimately cowards. Quick-tempered and fond of violence, a hill giant gladly raids and pillages the defenseless but is quick to flee from those who are bigger, stronger, or better organized than they are. A hill giant is never above shoving or tricking one of their own kind to slow down their opponent or get the best loot.

Giants are massive humanoid creatures who live in remote regions throughout the world. They are divided into a number of subtypes.

xEHY10Oxi5BJJCmQ.name: Wide Swing
xEHY10Oxi5BJJCmQ.description:
The hill giant makes a single greatclub Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach.

This counts as two attacks for the hill giant's multiple attack penalty.

Hive Mother.name: 巢母 Hive Mother
Hive Mother.publicNotes:
Ankhrav hive mothers are fearsome predators that one can easily distinguish from the typical ankhrav not only by their greater size, but the presence of a large pair of razor-sharp, mantis-like arms.

Ankhravs are immense, burrowing, and insectile predators, considered by inhabitants of the rural areas of the world to be an all-too-common plague.

sPdAzqQnoaixFizq.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

PIKiUX4h9vUWIM3Y.name: Armor-Rending Bite
PIKiUX4h9vUWIM3Y.description: The hive mother makes a mandibles Strike; if the Strike hits, the target's armor takes the damage and the acid damage bypasses the armor's Hardness.

2QnPX6haUy6RjKvT.name: Frenzy Pheromone
2QnPX6haUy6RjKvT.description:
The hive mother unleashes a pheromone that causes all other ankhravs within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100] to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} until the start of the hive mother's next turn, and they can use the extra action only for Burrow, Stride, or Strike actions.

The hive mother can't unleash the pheromone again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

waCZVvDN6vAn7yCi.name: Spray Acid
waCZVvDN6vAn7yCi.description:
The hive mother spews acid in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60], dealing [[/r {8d6}[acid]]]{8d6 acid damage} and [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]]@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save).

It can't spew acid again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Lamia.name: 拉米亚 Lamia
Lamia.publicNotes:
Just as they were cursed long ago, lamias can curse those they touch, clouding the mind and regressing conscious thought to purely animalistic instincts. Creatures affected by this curse grow reckless, becoming unaware of the consequences of their own actions and unable to think clearly. This makes the hapless victim all the more susceptible to the lamia's cunning illusions and insidious charms. The lamia's animalistic nature and the effect of their cursed touch has led some scholars to theorize that the original lamias must have, millennia ago, turned away from their own reason and intellect and embraced the life of simple beasts. Whether this change was rewarded as a monstrous gift from Lamashtu or inflicted as a curse for abandoning their responsibilities by Pharasma remains the subject of debate to this day.

Whatever the source of this ancient transformation, lamias themselves have grown to enjoy the strengths it has granted them. Regardless, they continue to cling to a hatred of the gods, seeing them as the cause of their monstrous forms and, thus, their eternal exile from the societies they watch with jealous eyes from their lairs amid the ruins of lost civilizations. Because lamias blame divine powers for their curse, they take special delight in the downfall of temples, the suffering and death of champions and clerics, and the spread of dissension within organized religions.

While they can briefly assume humanoid form with magic, lamias are usually forced to hide from civilization, making their homes in the barren wilderness. There, they attract cults of their own, gathering up chaotic and evil humanoids. With the help of these cultists, lamias strive to bring down popular faiths, introduce schisms into flourishing churches, and humiliate or defame high-profile religious leaders. Most lamias themselves have no true religious faith in anything, hearing instead a mystical calling that manifests as sighs on the desert wind or murmurs from the dark places between the stars.

Lamias are traditionally matriarchal, revering the eldest female among them as leader, mother, and shaman.

Lamias are bloodthirsty victims of an ancient curse for which they blame the gods. Most lamias are humanoid from the waist up but have the lower bodies of beasts and monsters. Sinister magic comes naturally to a lamia, and they prefer the use of illusions and enchantments to deceive prey for later consumption, or simply to torture.

ppjNzzAe843rXraz.name: 类人形态(随意施法) Humanoid Form (At Will)
ppjNzzAe843rXraz.description:
你将自身变成某种中型或者小型类人生物的外观，例如矮人（dwarf）、精灵（elf）、地精（goblin）、半身人（halfling）、人类（human）、兽人（orc）或者蜥蜴人（lizardfolk）。处于该形态时，包含你本来的其他特征，并获得类人特征，以及其他与该生物类型相关的特征（例如地精或者人类）。如果该变形减少了你的体型，他也会对应减少你的触及（如缩小术（shrink）法术）。该变形不会改变你的任何数据，并且你不会获得你变形为的类人形态的任何特殊能力。你仍然可以穿戴和使用你的装备，它会改变大小来适应你的新形态（仅如果需要）。如果物品离开你，它会回到本来的大小。

类人形态 赋予你在假装成所选择族裔的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且你会加上你的等级，即使你未受训，但是你不能让你看起来像某个特定的人。如果你想要假扮（Impersonate）某个个人，你仍然需要制造伪装，但GM不会将族裔不同计入你的欺骗（Deception）检定DC中。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (3环级) 如果你变作的形态有，则你获得黑暗视觉或者昏暗视觉。

升阶 (5环级) 你可以变为大型类人生物的外形。这会增加你的体型，你获得变巨术的效果。

tP4ZIVuA54L3bsJ5.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At Will)
tP4ZIVuA54L3bsJ5.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6英寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

75DxWIhLD9bX4O9C.name: 幻象造物(随意施法) Illusory Object (At Will)
75DxWIhLD9bX4O9C.description:
你创造一个固定物体的视觉幻象。该幻象必须能完全处于法术区域中。该物体会自然活动，但是不会发出声音或者产生气味。举例而言，幻象瀑布中会出现水并流下，但是它会是安静的。

当生物触摸幻像，或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它时，该生物可以尝试不相信你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 你的幻象也会发出合适的声音，产生正常气味，并且摸起来也很正常。该法术获得听觉特征。该持续时间增加到1小时。

升阶 (5环级) 如2环级，但是持续时间为无限。

SMkVM2bU3GVaaAAp.name: 腹语术(随意施法) Ventriloquism (At Will)
SMkVM2bU3GVaaAAp.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

oyHWuTde1I33SKT6.name: Lamia's Caress
oyHWuTde1I33SKT6.description: The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}. If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

Leopard.name: 花豹 Leopard
Leopard.publicNotes:
Leopards are among the smallest of the big cats, yet they are still dangerous creatures to tangle with. Leopard statistics can also be used for black panthers, white-spotted snow leopards, or tawny-coated cougars.

Few predators of the natural world can match the cat's talent for stalking and stealth.

uEjliLhQWBsVYCsE.name: Maul
uEjliLhQWBsVYCsE.description: The leopard makes two claw Strikes against a creature it has @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. Both count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after both attacks are made.

iuFRjKw2PLJl3E3F.name: Pounce
iuFRjKw2PLJl3E3F.description: The leopard Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the leopard began this action @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

8Hc25NUrYBwSHQuO.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
8Hc25NUrYBwSHQuO.description:
The leopard deals [[/r {1d4}[precision]]]{1d4 extra precision damage} to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Ochre Jelly.name: 赭冻怪 Ochre Jelly
Ochre Jelly.publicNotes:
Ochre jellies are animate masses of protoplasm with a sickly combination of yellow, orange, and brown hues. Their acidic bodies dissolve flesh but leave other materials, including a victim's gear and bones, intact. Some ancient cultures would entomb bodies in stone sarcophaguses with ochre jellies to allow the ooze to break down the flesh and clean and polish the bones.

Slimes, molds, and other oozes can be found in dank dungeons and shadowed forests. While not necessarily evil, some grow to enormous sizes and have insatiable appetites.

MwXQ4IgNkQaCxTcf.name: Motion Sense 60 feet
MwXQ4IgNkQaCxTcf.description: A ochre jelly can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

IWkgxOKsoYOGSw3E.name: Split
IWkgxOKsoYOGSw3E.description:
Whenever an ochre jelly is hit by an attack or effect that would deal slashing, piercing, or electricity damage and the ochre jelly has at least 10 HP, the jelly splits into two identical jellies with half the original's HP.

One jelly is in the same space as the original, and the other appears in an adjacent unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, it automatically pushes creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space (the GM decides if an object or creature is too big or sturdy to push).

8CYcAwzfjTavahvb.name: 紧勒 Constrict
8CYcAwzfjTavahvb.description:
[[/r {1d8+3}[bludgeoning]+{2d4}[acid]]]{1d8+3 bludgeoning damage plus 2d4 acid damage}, @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|basic:true] save

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Constrict]

D89X40fEKxTsupQC.name: Ochre Acid
D89X40fEKxTsupQC.description: An ochre jelly's acid damages only flesh-not bone, stone, wood, or other materials.

Nilith.name: 虐戾怪 Nilith
Nilith.publicNotes:
The sleek, dark niliths resemble hairless, emaciated tree sloths. These creatures are intensely dangerous and fearsome, with red glowing eyes, wicked claws, and mouths full of needlelike teeth. Niliths feed off the emotions, fears, and flesh of the living, and folktales posit that those who have nightmares of these creatures are fated to one day be eaten by them. Niliths draw intense joy from tormenting sapient creatures, often focusing their predations on the pious and the just, from whom they draw forth their most basic fears and worst thoughts and revel in their victims' subsequent terror. More often than not, these despicable manipulators wish to drive their victims into madness and even to suicide. Most niliths lack the patience to spend too much time fully tearing down an individual, and when a nilith tires of its current plaything and becomes bored with its particular thoughts and fears, it murders the quarry before feeding on its flesh and moving onto the next victim.

Niliths are actually extensions of much deadlier creatures that dwell in a distant dimension beyond dreams-in a way, niliths are little more than remote feeding machines for the unknown alien entities to which they are connected. Scholars and dimensional travelers have attempted to uncover the exact mechanisms of this mysterious connection, but they have yet to decipher the truth. Indeed, many who investigate the nature of the nilith's bond are driven to madness before getting anywhere close. The odd connection to otherworldly beings might help explain the longevity of these creatures, as it is believed that niliths can live for thousands of years.

Thankfully for others, niliths are solitary creatures that hate the company of their own kind, likely because these harbingers of nightmares have no wish to taste the horrors they bring to others.

ocXnP9gX04w867AF.name: 梦魇术 Nightmare
ocXnP9gX04w867AF.description:
你向目标送去一段恼人的噩梦。在目标下一次入睡时，它必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果你知道目标的名字但是从未遇见过它，目标在意志豁免上获得+4环境加值。

大成功 目标不承受任何负面效果，并暂时免疫1星期。

成功 目标经历了噩梦，但不会承受除了糟糕回忆以外的负面效果。

失败 目标经历噩梦，并且在醒来时 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

大失败 目标经历噩梦，醒来时疲乏，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} 直到不再疲乏。

mqKNqpPb4SYPm9ck.name: 读心术(随意施法) Mind Reading (At Will)
mqKNqpPb4SYPm9ck.description:
你通过一次短暂的心灵接触来尝试阅读目标的想法。它必须尝试一次意志豁免。目标会暂时免疫你的读心术1小时。

大成功 目标得知当施放该法术时你模糊的表层想法。

成功 你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

失败 你得知当施放该法术时目标模糊的表层想法，并且你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

大失败 如失败，并且在法术持续时间中，你可以维持该法术来再次侦测目标的表层想法。目标不会获得另外的豁免。

mKJTvwjtXZJUzRZA.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
mKJTvwjtXZJUzRZA.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

LuxUX599os0xTuFk.name: Mind Crush
LuxUX599os0xTuFk.description:
Requirements The nilith has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

Effect The nilith reaches into the mind of the grabbed creature and implants disjointed images of the victim's worst fears and nightmares. The grabbed creature takes [[/r {6d6}[mental]]]{6d6 mental damage} (@Check[type:will|dc:31|basic:true] save). On a critical failure, the target is also affected as though by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5BbU1V6wGSGbrmRD]{Feeblemind}, and it must attempt a second Will save against that effect.

Phistophilus.name: 契约魔 Phistophilus
Phistophilus.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Phistophilus.publicNotes:
Contract devils are clerks, scribes, and bureaucrats of Hell rarely found outside the infernal courts, and then almost always to pursue potential contracts, tempting mortals to sell their souls in exchange for achieving their worldly desires. If a target is desirable enough, a phistophilus can offer contracts for prices seemingly lesser than their soul all at once, though in this case, the devil carefully manipulates the price to drive the signatory toward the forces of law and evil, and therefore ultimately to Hell anyway. Contract devils are tall creatures with skin tones that range from bronze to crimson and large curving horns extending from their bodies, over which they often drape favored or important contracts.

Masters of corruption and architects of conquest, devils seek both to tempt mortal life to join in their pursuit of all things profane and to spread tyranny throughout all worlds. The temptations they offer mortals range from great powers granted by the signing of an infernal contract to twisted favors following a whispered pledge to a diabolic patron, or any number of even subtler exchanges. Those who succumb to these temptations find themselves consigned to an afterlife of endless torment in the pits of Hell, wherein the only hope of escape lies in the chance of being promoted to become a devil in the infernal ranks. Every devil has a specific role to play in the upkeep of the remorseless bureaucratic machine that is Hell, from soldiers and scholars to inquisitors, lawyers, judges, and executioners. Lowly lemures and imps perform subservient labor to more powerful and specialized devils, such as contract devils and erinyes, while the greatest pit fiends command entire infernal armies.

k71389gZFoOINHgu.name: Scrying (At Will) (See Infernal Investment)
k71389gZFoOINHgu.description:
你使用魔法探测所选择的生物。探知类似 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{鹰眼术 Clairvoyance}，但其影像没有那么精确，无法用以传送术（teleport）以及其他类似法术。你在目标上方直接创造一个眼睛，而不是在500尺内的地点创造一个眼睛。当你选择一个目标时，你要么了解其名字，要么接触其一个所有物或者其身体一部分。如果你没有遇见过目标，探知的DC减少2，并且如果你不知道目标的特征（例如你在犯罪现场发现了一颗未知生物的牙），该DC改为减少10。探知的效果基于目标的意志豁免骰。

大成功 法术失败，并且目标暂时免疫1星期。目标也会瞥见你，并且了解到你的大致距离和方向。

成功 该法术结束，并且目标暂时免疫1天。

失败 该法术成功。

大失败 该法术成功，并且眼睛会随着目标移动，每轮移动至多60尺。

oce5SfF9Q7CSbVQZ.name: 短讯术(随意施法) Sending (At Will)
oce5SfF9Q7CSbVQZ.description: 你向该生物发送一段25词或者更短的精神信息，并且它能够立即回复一段由他所编纂的25词或者更短的信息。

q8F4JeOhDTotBaIW.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
q8F4JeOhDTotBaIW.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

F8nRkJXtcFFzX0NM.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
F8nRkJXtcFFzX0NM.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

2dn1x9gUL9VsuED3.name: 定位术(随意施法) Locate (At Will)
2dn1x9gUL9VsuED3.description:
你了解目标的方位（如果你选择一个特定物品，例如 "我母亲的剑") 或者最近的目标（如果你选择一类物品，例如 "剑")。如果目标是特定物体，你必须曾经通过你自身的感官观察过它。如果是一类物体，你仍然需要有该类物体的精确内心印象。如果你和目标之间有铅或者流动的水，该法术无法定位该物体。这意味着你可能找一类物体时，因为最近的那个在铅或者流动的水后面，而获得较远的结果。

升阶 (5环级) 你能以一个特定生物或者族裔为目标，而不是物体。但你必须遇见过或者近距看过你想要作为目标的生物或者族裔。

u7KKqiGPDfFHLyot.name: 读心术(随意施法) Mind Reading (At Will)
u7KKqiGPDfFHLyot.description:
你通过一次短暂的心灵接触来尝试阅读目标的想法。它必须尝试一次意志豁免。目标会暂时免疫你的读心术1小时。

大成功 目标得知当施放该法术时你模糊的表层想法。

成功 你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

失败 你得知当施放该法术时目标模糊的表层想法，并且你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

大失败 如失败，并且在法术持续时间中，你可以维持该法术来再次侦测目标的表层想法。目标不会获得另外的豁免。

j8siVDe0K7zuTlZj.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
j8siVDe0K7zuTlZj.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

a3pejXzpAHLXkYWu.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

SdvOPdD36kKFhSXc.name: Ward Contract
SdvOPdD36kKFhSXc.description: A signed contract carried by a living contract devil (including draped over its horns) is immune to damage from all creatures other than that contract devil. A contract devil is immune to mental effects that would make it destroy, nullify, or alter a contract.

RiTHbEGvltSHb56S.name: Draft Contract
RiTHbEGvltSHb56S.description:
The contract devil produces an infernal contract for a single living mortal. This contract can grant a wide range of abilities and effects, akin to the power of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish} spell but fulfilled to the letter by the contract devil. To receive any of those benefits, the mortal must willingly sign its true name to the contract. At that point, the mortal's soul is bound to the contract devil and Hell.

While the contract is in effect, the victim can't be restored to life except by wish or similar magic. If the mortal is restored to life by those means, the contract devil knows which mortal came to life and can locate the creature or creatures who restored the mortal to life for 1 year, gaining the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{Locate} spell with unlimited range. Avoiding the terms of an infernal contract is difficult and often dangerous.

eWlvpYGryxxhSJkS.name: Infernal Investment
eWlvpYGryxxhSJkS.description: A contract devil can cast a 10th-level innate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r784cIz17eWujtQj]{Scrying} spell at will, but only to target a creature with which it has a contract. The target automatically critically fails its save.

odPtrANIuNiSlgo5.name: Infernal Wound
odPtrANIuNiSlgo5.description:
A contract devil's Strikes also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed3d6.success] that resists attempts to heal it.

The flat check to stop the bleeding starts at @Check[type:flat|dc:20]. The DC is reduced to @Check[type:flat|dc:15] only if the bleeding creature or an ally successfully assists with the recovery. The DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} to a creature with an infernal wound is increased by 5.

A spellcaster or item attempting to use healing magic on a creature suffering from an infernal wound must succeed at a DC 29 counteract check or the magic fails to heal the creature.

Purple Worm.name: 紫虫 Purple Worm
Purple Worm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知（模糊）100尺
Purple Worm.publicNotes:
紫虫是最常见和最臭名远扬的洞穴蠕虫，这种非常可怕的怪物游荡在黑暗之地的扭曲的隧道中，它能以一己之力挖出整个洞穴系统。紫虫挖出的洞穴并不总能在这些生物离开之后维持很长时间，所以它们的巢穴是充满断头隧道的令人发狂的巨大迷宫，在这迷宫中寻找紫虫的巢穴中心时，往往会发现之前的受害者留下的惊人宝藏。

洞穴蠕虫是超级巨大的食腐动物，它们钻到世界深处，吞食找到的任何东西。这些蠕虫以各自独特的颜色而得名，它们非常贪婪，且破坏力强大。不同颜色和能力的洞穴蠕虫潜伏在世界上更偏远的角落——比如传说中居住在巨大冰川或冰山中的白虫，和在早已被遗忘的废墟的墓葬中钻洞的灰虫。

BJ1PhJfeJAlUL4sL.name: 震颤感知（模糊）100尺 Tremorsense (Imprecise) 100 feet

IoAJluZoGb9mgLGv.name: 势不可挡 Inexorable
IoAJluZoGb9mgLGv.description: 当紫虫的回合结束时，从@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}状态中恢复。它对减少移动速度和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}状态免疫，并且无视困难地形和高等困难地形。

y0G6Hcirsc4uakIL.name: 摆脱 Shake It Off
y0G6Hcirsc4uakIL.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 紫虫将要受到某种状态或不利效果影响（例如@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{恶意变形术 Baleful Polymorph}）。

效果 紫虫使触发此能力的效果无效。来自神器、神祇或类似的力量造成的效果无法用此能力避免。

rGTmjeER3V1KY02w.name: 快速吞咽 Fast Swallow
rGTmjeER3V1KY02w.description:
触发 紫虫@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs}一个生物。

效果 紫虫使用活吞能力。

crXV18abZr2DcEh8.name: 反刍 Regurgitate
crXV18abZr2DcEh8.description:
紫虫能将它吞下的生物或巨石猛烈地呕吐出来作为一次远程打击。此打击造成钝击伤害，数值取决于抛射物的体型：超小型[[/r {2d6+13}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6+13}, 小型[[/r {3d6+13}[bludgeoning]]]{3d6+13}, 中型[[/r {4d6+13}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6+13}, 大型[[/r {5d6+13}[bludgeoning]]]{5d6+13}, 和 超大型[[/r {6d6+13}[bludgeoning]]]{6d6+13}。被反刍的生物受到坠落伤害，高度取决于和目标的高度差或20尺，以两者中较大的为准。

巨石在紫虫的胃中占据空间相当于同体型的生物。紫虫通常会在平时吞下几块巨石备用。紫虫可以使用一个单动作来吞咽新的巨石。

8EY2qfk7YZdvckfJ.name: 掘洞者 Rock Tunneler
8EY2qfk7YZdvckfJ.description: 紫虫能在坚硬的岩石中以20尺的速度掘进。如果它愿意的话，可以在行经路线上留下隧道，事实上紫虫通常就是这么做的。

zEZW1atU8KQCSsNi.name: 连环击 Thrash
zEZW1atU8KQCSsNi.description: 紫虫能对触及范围内的所有生物进行一次打击。它可以最多进行一次牙咬打击、一次针刺打击和无数次虫体打击。每次攻击都计入紫虫的多重攻击减值，但是在此项行动的全部攻击动作都结束之后生效。

Riding Dog.name: 骑乘犬 Riding Dog
Riding Dog.publicNotes:
Riding dogs types include larger dogs, such as mastiffs, wolfhounds, and huskies, and are bred often by halflings and gnomes to serve as mounts. Riding dogs are as loyal and devoted to their masters as guard dogs, and are ferocious in battle, regardless of whether they bear a rider or not. As with guard dogs, these large hounds can be wild or feral in nature, and, in some cases, might rival packs of wolves with regard to the danger they pose to inhabitants of rural areas.

Dogs are trusted and loyal companions that serve as guardians, protectors, and hunting companions. Their ability to detect prey or predators via scent and their predilection to accompany humanoids makes them ideal pets for most adventurers. There are hundreds of breeds of dogs in the world-from tiny lapdogs who shower their masters in affection to muscular dogs that stand nearly 4 feet high at the shoulder-and they can be found in nearly any place where people reside. Larger breeds might even be used as mounts for smaller adventurers, and some cultures use dogs as beasts of burden capable of pulling sleds loaded with supplies across the icy tundra. Regardless, many adventurers find value in having a dog.

FhLr7TEb7n9FRT5I.name: Pack Attack
FhLr7TEb7n9FRT5I.description: The dog's Strikes deal [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4 extra damage} to creatures within the reach of at least two of the dog's allies.

Riding Horse.name: 骑乘马 Riding Horse
Riding Horse.publicNotes: Horses serve as mounts and beasts of burden in many societies. They are loyal and typically gentle creatures, and they are invaluable to those looking to travel long distances. Smaller folk, like gnomes and halflings, often utilize ponies as mounts, while horses are the favored steeds for humans and other Medium humanoids. Most horses that the average humanoid encounters are domesticated, though large herds of these powerful animals can be found in the wild.

I1o6uYgy06gzdYSk.name: Gallop
I1o6uYgy06gzdYSk.description: The riding horse Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

Sea Devil Baron.name: 海魔鬼头领 Sea Devil Baron
Sea Devil Baron.publicNotes:
Unlike in many cultures, the highest-ranking sea devils are expected not just to wade into battle alongside their brethren, but to actively lead the campaign.

Sea devils are horrid, amphibious humanoids who lurk in Golarion's oceans and crawl ashore to steal away victims beneath the veil of darkness. When an entire fishing village disappears overnight, sea devils are the first suspects.

Far from mindless monstrosities, sea devils are terribly intelligent, with a cunning limited only by their strict adherence to hierarchy. They call themselves "sahuagin" but have wholly embraced their enemies' name for their kind as their own. Their cultural militancy enables sea devils to act in concert to perform grand acts of sabotage, marauding, and pillaging, and only the strongest (and most conniving) members of the tribe make it to the top of the social ladder. For all their discipline, however, sea devils are widely known to snap into murderous frenzies at the scent of blood. Even the best-laid plans can fall apart when a sea devil breaks ranks to revel in the spilled blood of their victims, an indulgence that can quickly cause a chain reaction of bloodthirsty ecstasy throughout an entire raiding party. For this reason, sea devils typically capture landborne quarry using nets and ropes, dragging them to the depths of the sea before making even a single incision.

Among sea devil society, individuals are rewarded based on their performance during hunts and shore excursions, with rebels and outliers quickly culled from the ranks. Every pup is given a fair chance, however, and even the lowest-born sea devil can strive for the rank of commander, general, or perhaps even king or queen. Sea devils in positions of leadership tend to be among the largest, most violent, and most calculating of their kind, and fully realized sea devils are skilled warriors capable of capturing entire villages on their own. The most powerful sea devils are mighty kings and queens who coordinate the activity of lesser sea devils across territories spanning leagues, foiling attempts at their positions via manufactured blood feuds and wars against their numerous enemies ashore and underwater.

0HSgD6W8PvrZ62ts.name: Shark Commune 150 feet
0HSgD6W8PvrZ62ts.description: The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like "come," "guard," or "attack."

vjCJtuDBXH0SYNN7.name: Blood Frenzy
vjCJtuDBXH0SYNN7.description:
Requirements The sea devil is not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or already in a frenzy

Trigger The sea devil deals bleed damage to a living creature.

Effect The sea devil flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the sea devil gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with its claws and jaws, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with its claws and jaws, gains 15 temporary HP until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The sea devil can't voluntarily stop its frenzy. After its frenzy, the sea devil is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.ScZ8tlV5zS0Jwnqn]{Effect: Blood Frenzy}

P0MPVynVKmKMh3FI.name: Bloodletting
P0MPVynVKmKMh3FI.description: When the sea devil deals piercing or slashing damage, it also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success] if the target was @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} or if the attack was a critical hit.

RyRiVUoP2scafR6g.name: Hateful Tide
RyRiVUoP2scafR6g.description:
Requirement The sea devil baron is in a blood frenzy.

Effect The sea devil baron unleashes a whirlwind of attacks against its foes, making a single melee Strike with its claws or jaws against each opponent within reach.

Sea Devil Brute.name: 海魔鬼暴徒 Sea Devil Brute
Sea Devil Brute.publicNotes:
Physically imposing sea devils are equipped with some of the best weaponry the community can find, though most are happy to rend their foes using tooth and nail.

Sea devils are horrid, amphibious humanoids who lurk in Golarion's oceans and crawl ashore to steal away victims beneath the veil of darkness. When an entire fishing village disappears overnight, sea devils are the first suspects.

Far from mindless monstrosities, sea devils are terribly intelligent, with a cunning limited only by their strict adherence to hierarchy. They call themselves "sahuagin" but have wholly embraced their enemies' name for their kind as their own. Their cultural militancy enables sea devils to act in concert to perform grand acts of sabotage, marauding, and pillaging, and only the strongest (and most conniving) members of the tribe make it to the top of the social ladder. For all their discipline, however, sea devils are widely known to snap into murderous frenzies at the scent of blood. Even the best-laid plans can fall apart when a sea devil breaks ranks to revel in the spilled blood of their victims, an indulgence that can quickly cause a chain reaction of bloodthirsty ecstasy throughout an entire raiding party. For this reason, sea devils typically capture landborne quarry using nets and ropes, dragging them to the depths of the sea before making even a single incision.

Among sea devil society, individuals are rewarded based on their performance during hunts and shore excursions, with rebels and outliers quickly culled from the ranks. Every pup is given a fair chance, however, and even the lowest-born sea devil can strive for the rank of commander, general, or perhaps even king or queen. Sea devils in positions of leadership tend to be among the largest, most violent, and most calculating of their kind, and fully realized sea devils are skilled warriors capable of capturing entire villages on their own. The most powerful sea devils are mighty kings and queens who coordinate the activity of lesser sea devils across territories spanning leagues, foiling attempts at their positions via manufactured blood feuds and wars against their numerous enemies ashore and underwater.

PB7yguG7pz4ib0ps.name: Shark Commune 150 feet
PB7yguG7pz4ib0ps.description: The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like "come," "guard," or "attack."

IsvDyyM2ZO6XxnsU.name: Blood Frenzy
IsvDyyM2ZO6XxnsU.description:
Requirements The sea devil is not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or already in a frenzy

Trigger The sea devil deals bleed damage to a living creature.

Effect The sea devil flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the sea devil gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with its claws and jaws, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with its claws and jaws, gains 11 temporary HP until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The sea devil can't voluntarily stop its frenzy. After its frenzy, the sea devil is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.ScZ8tlV5zS0Jwnqn]{Effect: Blood Frenzy}

cbuxKyYefdlX5AAX.name: Bloodletting
cbuxKyYefdlX5AAX.description: When the sea devil deals piercing or slashing damage, it also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success] if the target was @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} or if the attack was a critical hit.

inQcsNlqlQ4umup7.name: Unimpeded Throw
inQcsNlqlQ4umup7.description: A sea devil brute can use thrown ranged weapons underwater with no penalty due to range increment.

Sea Hag.name: 海鬼婆 Sea Hag
Sea Hag.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Sea Hag.publicNotes:
Sea hags kill and eat fishers and sailors who come near their lairs, torment coastal dwellers with dark promises and vague threats, and enjoy the act of causing distress and discord in small towns. They generally avoid making their lairs too close to civilization, however, to avoid drawing enemies to their homes. Sea hags are known for tempting desperate victims into tragic and inescapable bargains, deals which the hag has already secretly stacked in her favor. Despite their voracious appetites, sea hags appear hideously emaciated, and unlike more powerful hags, they lack the ability to magically disguise their form.

Sea hags can join covens, but their aquatic nature often prevents them from joining mixed covens with other kinds of hags.

Malevolent crones who lurk at the edges of civilization, hags use their deceptive, magical abilities to prey upon humanoids, manipulating and corrupting them. Some say hags arose from fey that became twisted by their inner selfishness. Hags gather together in covens for greater power, craft unique magical items known as @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ACa9QlFqdmW4s2Th]{Hag Eyes}, and are known to replace infant humanoids with their own offspring-these children are @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.bAjHCeyNcPRqOmLv]{Changelings} who have the potential to become hags themselves.

DXn63TBMmkKeN9Wu.name: Coven
DXn63TBMmkKeN9Wu.description:
A sea hag adds @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0]{Acid Arrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.z2mfh3oPnfYqXflY]{Mariner's Curse}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk} to her coven's spells.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Coven]

ydbvsWl1BoVazVZj.name: Sea Hag's Bargain
ydbvsWl1BoVazVZj.description: The sea hag can make a bargain with a willing creature, who must be of sound mind. The creature gives away a special or cherished quality-such as its courage, its beauty, or its voice-in exchange for a boon or a promise from the sea hag. As long as the sea hag keeps her end of the bargain, the only way to restore the lost quality is to defeat the sea hag or make another bargain for its return.

icuRBAbmsZKQdilF.name: Dread Gaze
icuRBAbmsZKQdilF.description:
The hag gazes upon a creature, afflicting it with intense distress and a gnawing sense of impending doom, with a result depending on its @Check[type:will|dc:20] save. The target does not need to be able to see the sea hag.

Critical Success No effect.

Success @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure Frightened 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If the target was dying, it remains @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Critical Failure @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and slowed 1 for 1 minute. If the target was dying, it remains unconscious for 1 day. At the end of the day, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the same DC; if it fails, it dies.

Storm Lord.name: 风暴领主 Storm Lord
Storm Lord.publicNotes:
Storm lords wage battles to claim important territory within the Plane of Air.

Hailing from the Plane of Air, these beings appear in a variety of sizes and shapes.

Y6X7el3YHox3syH1.name: Disperse
Y6X7el3YHox3syH1.description:
Trigger The storm lord takes damage from a hostile action.

Effect The storm lord disperses.

Until the end of the current turn, it can't be attacked or targeted, doesn't take up space, and any auras or emanations it has are suppressed. At the end of the turn, the storm lord reforms in any space in which it can fit within 50 feet of where it dispersed and any auras or emanations it has are restored as long as their duration didn't run out while it was dispersed.

QPywhw5X98V0NX5g.name: High Winds
QPywhw5X98V0NX5g.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for Flying creatures that do not have the air trait.

euRdPTOZHeLTJZHA.name: Swiftness
euRdPTOZHeLTJZHA.description: The storm lord's movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Triceratops.name: 三角龙 Triceratops
Triceratops.senses: 昏暗视觉，嗅觉（模糊感官）30尺
Triceratops.publicNotes:
三角龙是一种肌肉发达的四足动物，腿短而有力，脖子粗，头部周围有一个宽大的骨板褶边。虽然它们的鼻子上有一个大角，额头上各有一个，然而些恐龙是食草动物，它们只用这些突出的骨头来保护自己免受攻击，或者在与其他三角龙激烈的冲突中争夺食物和交配权。三角龙脾气暴躁，固执，不善于在战斗中退让，除非它们无可救药地处于劣势。这种生物以毫无理由地战斗到死亡而闻名遐迩。三角龙经常充当蜥蜴人、半兽人和巨人的坐骑，骑手们可以舒适地骑在三角龙带有保护性的骨褶后面。三角龙通常体长30尺，重达10吨。

三角龙无疑是角鼻龙类中最著名的恐龙，但还有许多其他更小体型的三角龙变种存在。例如，较小的戟龙sauropods只有一个角，但在它们的骨板褶边上有几个角状突起。

这些巨大的爬行动物是世界原始时代的遗留物，现在仍然大量存在于偏僻的荒野中，或者在黑暗之地Darklands 的地下魔法洞穴中。蜥蜴族、半兽人、巨人和其他人形生物有时会把恐龙当作坐骑、守卫或猎兽。众所周知，人类和其他族裔也收集恐龙，把它们放在动物园里展出，或把它们当作异域宠物或守卫。这通常是富人或怪咖喜欢干的事情，但确实也有一些德鲁伊和其他自然的守护者能与恐龙亲密相处，甚至把它们作为动物伙伴。当恐龙在它们正常栖息地以外的地区安家时，通常可能是因为被圈养的恐龙逃进荒野造成的。

GkFwtCILr5PvesJA.name: 嗅觉（模糊感官）30尺 Scent (Imprecise) 30 feet

D2tbPVYsNe8XmlsW.name: 骨板防护 Frill Defense
D2tbPVYsNe8XmlsW.description:
触发 骑乘者被作为攻击目标。

需求 必须有生物骑乘三角龙。

效果 三角龙用脑袋周围的骨板保护骑乘者，骑乘者对触发此能力的攻击，AC获得+2 环境加值。

OW9KKx3Offpslmah.name: 笨拙冲锋 Lumbering Charge
OW9KKx3Offpslmah.description: 三角龙行走至多10尺然后进行一次打击。

bWfE1BR1kz8fIanF.name: 猛力戳刺 Vicious Gore
bWfE1BR1kz8fIanF.description: 三角龙的尖角攻击命中@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}的目标，造成额外@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success]。

Uthul.name: 狂怒雷暴 Uthul
Uthul.publicNotes: An uthul most often appears to be a dark, swirling cloud filled with flying debris and streaked with sudden flashes of lightning. Although they are clearly elemental in nature, uthuls are nearly always found on the Material Plane, where they hide among natural cloud formations, especially thunderstorms.

f52Whk1lgUmI3JmT.name: High Winds
f52Whk1lgUmI3JmT.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]{40 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Air in the aura is difficult terrain for Flying creatures without the air trait.

9KbMP0mPbueRMViR.name: Lightning Crash
9KbMP0mPbueRMViR.description:
The uthul unleashes a powerful bolt of lightning and a stunning thunderclap. The bolt deals [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12 electricity damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:30], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true] save, and every creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save.

The uthul can't use Lightning Crash again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Lightning Crash]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is stunned for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

nHfBhYOOHdy8Wx7p.name: Whirlwind Form
nHfBhYOOHdy8Wx7p.description:
The uthul transforms itself into a swirling vortex of storm and fury 10 feet wide and up to 40 feet tall. It stays in this form for 3 rounds or until it Dismisses the effect. While in this form, the uthul gains resistance 10 to physical damage and can move through other creatures.

Its aura remains active, but it can't make debris Strikes nor use Lightning Crash. Instead, any creature the uthul moves through takes [[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6 bludgeoning damage} and [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12 electricity damage}. A creature can take this damage only once per round. A Large or smaller creature must also succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:32] save or be picked up and held suspended within the vortex. Suspended creatures move with the uthul. A creature can attempt to escape by spending an action to attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:32] save (or a Acrobatics check to maneuver in flight if it has a fly Speed). Upon escaping, or when the uthul transforms back into its storm cloud form, a suspended creature is hurled [[/br 1d4*10]]{1d4 x 10 feet} in a random direction, then falls unless it can fly or otherwise remain aloft.

After returning to its normal form, the uthul must wait 1 minute before it can use Whirlwind Form again.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.rpxdrOlzY2SOtMWB]{Effect: Whirlwind Form}

Unseen Servant.name: 隐形仆役 Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.publicNotes: This creature can be summoned with the spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.xqmHD8JIjak15lRk]{Unseen Servant}.

EbIYH4fdrCUr8wIS.name: Force Body
EbIYH4fdrCUr8wIS.description: An unseen servant's physical body is made of force. It can't use attack actions. It can move and use Interact actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can't pass through solid objects.

UYnNMvrWFg5VBhO2.name: 隐形 Invisible
UYnNMvrWFg5VBhO2.description: An unseen servant is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, though it normally doesn't @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, so it is usually only @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

Vampire Count.name: 吸血鬼伯爵 Vampire Count
Vampire Count.hp: coffin restoration, fast healing 7, negative healing
Vampire Count.publicNotes:
Vampire counts rule their demesnes through a mix of fear and cruelty.

Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living.

1KpcQXgkKmJR4pYK.name: Dominate (At Will) (See Dominate)
1KpcQXgkKmJR4pYK.description:
你操控目标，强行令其服从你的命令。如果你赋予一项明显是自灭的命令，目标不会行动，直到你下达新的命令。该效果基于其意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} 以抵抗你的命令。

失败 你控制了目标，其获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{被控制 Controlled} 状态，但在每轮结束时可以尝试一次意志豁免。成功时，法术结束。

大失败 如同失败，但是仅当你施加违抗其天性的命令，例如杀害其盟友时，才会获得新的豁免。

升阶 (10环级) 该持续时间为无限。

TjOmyfilNvHKI58M.name: Children of the Night
TjOmyfilNvHKI58M.description:
The vampire's presence brings forth creatures of the night to do the master's bidding. These typically include @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.sPClc6y3dT3XZupv]{Rat Swarms}, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.VAWmwDA08ZLQd8lW]{Bat Swarms}, and @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Oilfs8Atv2LjAsUS]{Wolves}, but can include other creatures.

The vampire can give telepathic orders to these creatures as long as they are within 100 feet, but they can't communicate back.

gRQ32Y4BWrQbWOlS.name: Coffin Restoration
gRQ32Y4BWrQbWOlS.description: Unlike other undead, a vampire isn't destroyed at 0 HP. Instead, it falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. If its body rests in its coffin for 1 hour, the vampire gains 1 HP, after which its @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} begins to function normally.

iuyYNQtDMprDDoZH.name: Mist Escape
iuyYNQtDMprDDoZH.description:
Trigger The vampire is reduced to 0 HP.

Effect The vampire uses Turn to Mist. It can take move actions to move toward its coffin even though it's at 0 HP. While at 0 HP in this form, the vampire is unaffected by further damage.

It automatically returns to its corporeal form, unconscious, if it reaches its coffin or after 2 hours, whichever comes first.

OgOkCo3ZpgcUbZr1.name: Vampire Weaknesses
OgOkCo3ZpgcUbZr1.description:
All vampires possess the following weaknesses.

  • Compulsions Vampires are creatures of strange and unknowable compulsions. A typical vampire can't voluntarily cross running water unless it is transported while it hides within its coffin, nor can it enter a private dwelling unless invited in by someone with the authority to do so. At your discretion, vampires might have different compulsions-a pirate vampire might not be able to set foot on solid ground without being invited, for example. The vampire can still be forced to do these things and might be able to overcome its compulsion just as it does its revulsion.
  • Revulsion A vampire can't voluntarily come within 10 feet of brandished garlic or a brandished religious symbol of a non-evil deity. To brandish garlic or a religious symbol, a creature must Interact to do so for 1 round (similar to Raising a Shield). If the vampire involuntarily comes within 10 feet of an object of its revulsion, it gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition, running from the object of its revulsion until it ends an action beyond 10 feet. After 1 round of being exposed to the subject of its revulsion, a vampire can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25|name:Overcome Revulsion] save as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. On a success, it overcomes its revulsions for [[/br 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6 rounds} (or 1 hour on a critical success).
  • Stake A wooden stake driven through a vampire's heart drops the vampire to 0 HP and prevents it from healing above 0 HP, even in its coffin. Staking a vampire requires three actions and works only if the vampire is unconscious. If the stake is removed, the vampire can heal above 0 HP again, and if it's in its coffin the 1-hour rest period begins once the stake is removed. If the vampire's head is severed and anointed with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water} while the stake is in place, the vampire is destroyed.
  • Sunlight If exposed to direct sunlight, a vampire immediately becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the vampire ends its turn in sunlight. If the vampire loses all its actions in this way, it is destroyed. Due to their supernatural aversion to light, vampires don't cast shadows or show a reflection in mirrors.

QpzMidSalFaHGivw.name: Change Shape
QpzMidSalFaHGivw.description:
The vampire transforms into its animal form or back into its normal form.

  • Bat The vampire changes into a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.C9s5tBxVValC2HTE]{Giant Bat}
    • Size Large
    • Senses Echolocation 40 feet
    • Speed 20 feet, fly 30 feet
    • Melee fangs [[/r 1d20+15 #Fangs]]{+15}/[[/r 1d20+10 #Fangs]]{+10}/[[/r 1d20+5 #Fangs]]{+5}, Damage [[/r {1d8+9}[piercing]]]{1d8+9 piercing damage}

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

jnZDE6piOq3rzmdg.name: Create Spawn
jnZDE6piOq3rzmdg.description:
If a creature dies after being reduced to 0 HP by Drink Blood, the vampire can turn this victim into a vampire by donating some of its own blood to the victim and burying the victim in earth for 3 nights.

If the new vampire is lower level than its creator, it is under the creator's control. If a vampire controls too many spawn at once (as determined by the GM), strong-willed spawn can free themselves by succeeding at a @Check[type:will|dc:22|name:Escape Thralldom] saving throw against the vampire's Will DC.

AWS8p85NHI3IGL2n.name: Dominate
AWS8p85NHI3IGL2n.description:
The vampire can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{Dominate} at will as a divine innate spell. Casting it requires staring into the target's eyes, giving the spell the visual trait. The save DC uses the DC of the vampire's level, and a creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to that vampire's Dominate for 24 hours.

Fully destroying the vampire ends the domination, but merely reducing the vampire to 0 HP is insufficient to break the spell.

KESgZ7EFPclSlLY8.name: Drink Blood
KESgZ7EFPclSlLY8.description:
Requirement A @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or willing creature is within the vampire's reach.

Effect The vampire sinks its fangs into that creature to drink its blood. This requires an Athletics check against the victim's Fortitude DC if the victim is grabbed and is automatic for any of the other conditions.

The victim is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and the vampire regains [[/r {10}[healing]]]{10 Hit Points}, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points. Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the vampire but increases the victim's drain value by 1. A vampire can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but it gains no HP from doing so.

A victim's drained condition decreases by 1 per week. A blood transfusion, which requires a @Check[type:medicine|dc:20|name:Blood Transfusion] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drain by 1 after 10 minutes.

AVpXnwBBGoOo68pw.name: Turn to Mist
AVpXnwBBGoOo68pw.description:
The vampire turns into a cloud of vapor, as the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form} spell, or back to its normal form. The vampire loses @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} while in gaseous form.

The vampire can remain in this form indefinitely.

Young Copper Dragon.name: 青年赤铜龙 Young Copper Dragon
Young Copper Dragon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Young Copper Dragon.publicNotes:
Capricious and always eager to share a good laugh, copper dragons are among the wiliest of the metallic dragons, but this by no means interferes with their mission to spread freedom in oppressive lands. Copper dragons are hedonists who are quick to indulge in simple pleasures, but they're also sympathetic to other creatures, slow to pass judgment, and careful to always examine a situation from as many perspectives as possible. This philosophy has its drawbacks, however, as copper dragons are susceptible to negative influences and prone to forgiving the less serious evil acts performed by their chromatic cousins and other cruel creatures. Copper dragons also have a difficult time keeping their temper in check once they are roused to anger.

Copper dragons tend to lair in warm or temperate hills, but due to their nature, they move their lairs every few years. They sometimes live among other people, especially any dwarves who reside nearby. Some copper dragons even worship gods typically worshipped only by humanoids. Among these dragons, worship of Cayden Cailean is most popular, as they see his love of freedom and penchant for alcohol aligning with the typical copper dragon mindset.

A copper dragon's combat tactics are as unorthodox as its sense of humor, as it is more likely to use mockery and tricks than outright strength to win its battles. As a copper dragon ages, it perfects jokes capable of rendering its foes helpless with laughter.

Paragons of virtue, nobility, and grace, metallic dragons are benevolent entities revered as mythic beings akin to gods in both their power and majesty. Few have ever seen a metallic dragon firsthand, but tales of their intervention in mortals' lives-and of their passing-always spread far and wide. Named for the way their scales resemble the shining metals humanoids use in commerce, warfare, and industry, these immense beings are diverse in their interests and abilities, and they don't seem to mind being associated with such mundane materials. After all, to compare a gold dragon to a gold coin is like comparing an ocean to a glass of water-though they may seem similar at first glance, the raw power, breadth, and grandeur of one simply overwhelms the other.

In addition to metallic dragons and their chromatic counterparts, other types of dragons roam the world and the rest of the multiverse. In the legendary lands of Tian Xia on the other side of the globe are the imperial dragons, serpentine beings who protect the cosmic balance and defend their ancient homeland. Outside the Material Plane, primal dragons such as the domineering brine dragon and reclusive cloud dragon shape the nature and goings-on of the Elemental Planes. Countless other types of dragons are sure to exist, including dragons on far-flung planes of existence and, it is rumored, primeval dragons who soar between the stars.

7WeAEXR3VyG3ZRND.name: 油腻术(随意施法) Grease (At Will)
7WeAEXR3VyG3ZRND.description:
你创造一片油，其效果基于选择区域还是目标。

  • 区域 [4个连续的5尺方格] 区域中的所有坚实地面复盖上一层油。在油滑的表面上站立的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免，或者一次特技检定，对抗你的法术DC，否则会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。在法术持续时间内，使用动作移动到油滑表面上的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免或者特技检定来保持平衡。快步（Steps）或者爬行（Crawls）的生物无需尝试检定或者豁免。
  • 目标 [一个1负载或者更低的物体] 如果你对无主物品施放该法术，任何尝试捡起该物体的人必须尝试一次特技检定或者反射豁免，对抗你的法术DC，才能如此做。如果你以被持有物品为目标，拥有该物品的生物必须尝试一次特技检定或者反射豁免。失败时，持握者或者持用者在使用该物体的所有检定上承受-2环境减值；在大失败时，持握者或者持用者会掉落该物品。该物品会掉落在一个GM选择的相邻方格。如果你对一个穿戴物品施放该法术，穿戴着在对抗擒抱该物品的强韧豁免上获得+2环境加值。

AmPgQIXqmES8fImF.name: Climb Stone
AmPgQIXqmES8fImF.description: The dragon's climb speed functions only when climbing stone surfaces.

5wsaNGdGzezNTnea.name: Twisting Tail
5wsaNGdGzezNTnea.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the copper dragon's tail uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The dragon makes a tail Strike at the creature with a -2 penalty. If it hits, the dragon disrupts the triggering action.

RRFUmIxRsdfJqd8F.name: Breath Weapon
RRFUmIxRsdfJqd8F.description:
The copper dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

  • Acid The dragon breathes acid in a @Template[type:line|distance:60|traits:acid,arcane,evocation,damaging-effect] that deals [[/r {8d6}[acid]]]{8d6 acid damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save).
  • Slowing Gas The dragon breathes a @Template[type:line|distance:60|traits:arcane,transmutation] of slowing gas. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} on a critical failure).

FLxvnmMACdVSSD13.name: Draconic Frenzy
FLxvnmMACdVSSD13.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.

LmcmQNgsnrAuSu2l.name: Draconic Momentum
LmcmQNgsnrAuSu2l.description: When the dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges Breath Weapon.

Zombie Shambler.name: 蹒跚丧尸 Zombie Shambler
Zombie Shambler.publicNotes:
A zombie shambler is a slow-moving horror dangerous in larger groups.

A zombie's only desire is to consume the living. Unthinking and ever-shambling harbingers of death, zombies stop only when they're destroyed.

v90WRjELLiKF57vr.name: Jaws
v90WRjELLiKF57vr.description: Requirement The zombie has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

eulyI60JHNUYs39w.name: Slow
eulyI60JHNUYs39w.description: A zombie is permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Treerazer.name: 毁木者 Treerazer
Treerazer.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. magic
Treerazer.publicNotes:
Treerazer, the self-styled Lord of the Blasted Tarn, is a powerful demon on the cusp of ascending to the true power of one of the rulers of the Abyss itself-a demon lord. For now, even as a nascent demon lord, Treerazer is a dangerous foe.

Treerazer rarely leaves his swampy realm of Tanglebriar-a large thicket of tainted foliage and rotting detritus just south of Kyonin's Fierani Forest-but can be encountered anywhere within that toxic mire, often accompanied by a small legion of demons, corrupted fey, and other deadly allies. Certain occult rituals have the power to call him forth from Tanglebriar, granting him the opportunity to directly work his evils beyond the realm to which he has been exiled. Some believe that no eldritch force contains Treerazer and that, were he willing, he could travel Golarion with impunity, spreading the twisted blessings of his touch and the corruption of his presence, yet the Lord of the Blasted Tarn is as cunning and canny as he is deadly, and prefers to work his evils on the world from the safety of his nightmare realm.

2061tD7sNzE7eVL8.name: 缠结匐蔓(随意施法) Tangling Creepers (At Will)
2061tD7sNzE7eVL8.description: 茂密缠绕的蔓生植物从区域中所有表面中冒出，并充实每一块水体。。在该区域中的，在地面上移动的，在藤蔓上攀爬或者游泳的生物，在其速度上承受-10尺环境减值。每轮一次，你可以使用一个具有专注特征的单动作，令藤蔓从任何方格涌出。该藤蔓具有15尺触及。对目标尝试一次法术攻击骰；如果成功，该藤蔓会将目标拽入蔓生植物中，令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} ，持续1轮，或者直到该生物逃脱（Escape）（对抗你的法术DC），以先发生为准。

tUxELKWISy3m7jkP.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
tUxELKWISy3m7jkP.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

GU2jdu9qK8wjZI4y.name: 深渊瘟疫(随意施法) Abyssal Plague (At Will)
GU2jdu9qK8wjZI4y.description:
你通过触碰令目标感染深渊瘟疫，这种疾病会抽取其灵魂的碎片，并送往深渊（Abyss）。法术效果基于目标的强韧豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受每法术环级2邪恶伤害、并在对抗深渊瘟疫的豁免上获得-2状态减值，持续1天或直到目标被感染，以先满足为准。

失败 目标感染深渊瘟疫并到达阶段1。

大失败 目标感染深渊瘟疫并到达阶段2。

深渊瘟疫 Abyssal Plague (疾病 disease) 9级

除非该疾病被治愈，否则深渊瘟疫造成的流失（drained）状态无法被恢复。

阶段1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 1} (1天)

阶段2 流失值增加2 (1天)。

VVqysFMoKtZN6DF5.name: 深渊之怒(随意施法) Abyssal Wrath (At Will)
VVqysFMoKtZN6DF5.description:
你呼唤了来自某个深渊领域的力量。此法术的伤害类型（一种能量伤害以及一种物理伤害）按照下表随机获取。

深渊之怒 Abyssal Wrath

[[/r 1D4]] 领域 表现 伤害类型
1 天空 旋转的闪电与飞扬的破片 闪电和钝击
2 深坑 酸液与恶魔的残骸 酸和挥砍
3 冻土 寒冷的空气与冰块 寒冷和钝击
4 火山 锐利的火山岩与岩浆 火焰和穿刺

你对每个处于锥形区域内的生物造成每种伤害类型4d6点伤害（总计8d6点伤害）

升阶 (+1) 每种类型的伤害增加1d6点。

VboJYb1ueCUJCm1Z.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
VboJYb1ueCUJCm1Z.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

HTq6wxTPGq2vIAyk.name: 地缚术(随意施法) Earthbind (At Will)
HTq6wxTPGq2vIAyk.description:
你使用大地的重量以干扰目标的飞行能力，其效果基于强韧豁免。如果该生物安全到达地面，它不会承受坠落伤害。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标安全坠落至多120尺。

失败 目标安全坠落至多120尺。如果它碰到地面，它1轮内不能飞行，浮空或者以其他方式离开地面。

大失败 目标安全坠落至多120尺。如果它碰到地面，它1分钟内不能飞行，浮空或者以其他方式离开地面。

Ig3ZBIjZHGA9nqg6.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At Will)
Ig3ZBIjZHGA9nqg6.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

bQgMo8rXOJtdre8t.name: 念动战技(随意施法) Telekinetic Maneuver (At Will)
bQgMo8rXOJtdre8t.description: 你通过一股猛烈的念动力移动一个敌人或者其携带的事物。你可以对目标尝试卸武（Disarm），推撞（Shove），或者摔绊（Trip），使用法术攻击骰，而不是运动（Athletics）检定。

etv02A5iCRxbUkwf.name: Blackaxe
etv02A5iCRxbUkwf.description:
This potent weapon used by Treerazer is a +4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vQUIUAFOTOWj3ohh]{Corrosive (Greater)} major striking obsidian greataxe that grants a +4 item bonus to attack rolls, deals an extra 2d6 damage to plants, and has the properties of adamantine.

Activate1 (divination, scrying)

Requirements You aren't wielding Blackaxe and you are its true owner.

Effect You sense the world around Blackaxe as though you were in its location and can use any of your innate spells through the link as if it were the source of the spell. If another creature is wielding Blackaxe, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:50] or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} until it relinquishes the weapon.

Activatef command (conjuration, teleportation)

Requirements You aren't wielding Blackaxe and you are its true owner.

Effect Blackaxe appears in your hands, teleporting instantly from its prior location.

Activate1 command (death, healing, necromancy)

Frequency once per minute.

Effect Make a Strike against a living tree with Blackaxe. If it hits, the tree withers to ash and you heal 250 Hit Points and gain the benefit of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} (6th) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}.

9NSBH5zk6mEIcPjF.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

lPUoJQI3bTRTV4ct.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

spBsMqVOA8rbhE2e.name: Aura of Corruption
spBsMqVOA8rbhE2e.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:120]{120 feet} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Plants near Treerazer twist, deform, and transform into thorny or fungoid parodies of their natural shapes. A living creature in this area must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:47] save each round or become partially transformed into plantlike matter. Those who fail this saving throw are treated as if they were plants for the purposes of any effect that particularly harms or inconveniences plant creatures more than other creatures, but do not gain any benefits of being plant creatures. This effect lasts as long as the creature remains within the area of corruption and for 1 minute thereafter.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.3MIZf42EhhKbIwLQ]{Effect: Aura of Corruption}

NWBV7oqS64HKJSkz.name: Blackaxe - Link
NWBV7oqS64HKJSkz.description:
Requirements Treerazer isn't wielding Blackaxe.

Effect Treerazer senses the world around Blackaxe as though it were in its location and can use any of it's innate spells through the link as if it were the source of the spell. If another creature is wielding Blackaxe, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:50] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} until it relinquishes the weapon.

uyDcXzwKNRuKIzY5.name: Blackaxe - Restoration
uyDcXzwKNRuKIzY5.description:
Activate command

Frequency once per minute.

Effect Treerazer makes a Strike against a living tree with Blackaxe. If it hits, the tree withers to ash and Treerazer heals [[/r {250}[healing]]]{250 Hit Points} and gains the benefit of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} (6th) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}.

c09zz4QRa6hJSZ6q.name: Blackaxe - Teleport
c09zz4QRa6hJSZ6q.description:
Activate command
